data.lyric:
[ti:I Fall Apart]
[ar:Post Malone]
[al:Stoney (Deluxe)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]I Fall Apart (Clean) - Post Malone
[00:00.33]Oooh I fall apart
[00:04.07]
[00:06.58]Oooh yeah mmhmm
[00:12.33]
[00:16.90]She told me that I'm not enough yeah
[00:23.60]And she left me with a broken heart yeah
[00:30.19]She fooled me twice and it's all my fault yeah
[00:36.70]She cut too deep now she left me scarred yeah
[00:43.43]Now there's too many thoughts goin' through my brain yeah
[00:50.03]And now I'm takin' these shots like it's novacane yeah
[00:56.66]Oooh I fall apart
[01:00.67]
[01:01.89]Down to my core
[01:04.23]Oooh I fall apart
[01:07.27]
[01:08.39]Down to my core
[01:10.52]Oooh didn't know it before
[01:13.98]
[01:14.67]Surprised when you caught me off guard
[01:17.25]
[01:18.15]Hard as damn jewelry I bought
[01:20.66]
[01:21.55]You was my shorty I thought
[01:23.94]
[01:24.76]Never caught a feelin' this hard
[01:27.39]
[01:28.10]Harder than the liquor I pour
[01:30.61]
[01:31.48]Tell me you don't want me no more
[01:33.98]
[01:34.99]But I can't let go
[01:37.37]
[01:38.12]Everybody told me so
[01:40.52]
[01:41.34]Feelin' like I sold my soul
[01:43.88]
[01:44.66]Devil in the form of a whore
[01:47.18]
[01:47.99]Devil in the form of a whore
[01:50.42]You said it
[01:52.17]
[01:53.68]No you said it
[01:55.55]
[01:56.94]No you said it
[01:58.90]
[02:00.36]We'd be together
[02:01.98]
[02:02.76]Oooh I fall apart
[02:07.13]
[02:08.44]Down to my core
[02:10.45]Oooh I fall apart
[02:13.85]

[02:20.63]
[02:21.34]Surprised when you caught me off guard
[02:24.11]
[02:24.69]All this damn jewelry I bought
[02:27.33]
[02:28.18]You was my shorty I thought
[02:30.59]Ice keep pourin' and the drink keep flowin'
[02:33.79]Try to brush it off but it keep on goin'
[02:37.19]Covered in scars and I can't help showin'
[02:40.47]Whippin' in the foreign and the tears keep blowin'
[02:43.82]Ice keep droppin' and the drink keep flowin'
[02:47.06]Try to brush it off but it keep on goin'
[02:50.46]All these scars can't help from showin'
[02:53.79]Whippin' in the foreign and the tears keep blowin' yeah
[02:57.59]Oooh I fall apart
